email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of wheat from Santos to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. We have the vessel OCEAN BREEZE available for your shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for October 10-15. The initial freight quote is USD 45 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 42 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for your response. Considering the volume and our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 12,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10-15. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on October 10, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Wheat Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
